      • addPower

        public float addPower​(float fp)
        Adds power to the storage, if the capacity is breached the storage can explode
        Parameters:
        fp - is the power to add to the storage
        Returns:
        the remaining power if the storage gets full, the main logic is handled by the energy network.

      • initInventory

      • updateInventory

        public void updateInventory()
        This function is used to update our inventory. However it only runs 1/1s to not freak bukkit out.

      • consumePower

        Parameters:

        Returns:
